Document.Focus: Being active after your heart attack

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Being active after your heart attack ?
QAPair.Answer: A heart attack occurs when blood flow to a part of your heart is blocked long enough that part of the heart muscle is damaged or dies. Starting a regular exercise program is important to your recovery after a heart attack.
